title: Space invaders: sexual harrasment at work
brief_description: Space Invaders is a series of 7 trigger films designed to encourage the discussion of sexual harassment in the workplace; to raise awareness of the issue within organisations, to assist women to recognise sexual harassment for what it is, and to develop ways of dealing with it.
